article_title: Provincial border checkpoints barring entry, restricting travel raise constitutional questions
article_description: While the coronavirus pandemic has prompted a shutdown of non essential travel at the Canada U S  border  many provinces have also set up checkpoints at their borders to restrict traffic  raising questions about the constitutionality of such measures
article_content: While the coronavirus pandemic has prompted a shutdown of non essential travel at the Canada U S  border  a number of provinces have also set up checkpoints at their borders to restrict traffic  raising questions about the constitutionality of such measures   7751 chars
